Coyote is simply fantastic, the meal was excellent. I ordered the pepper stake (blue) the lad was sceptical saying the chef may not do it. Well let me tell you it was one of the best steaks I've ever had. The meal was perfect as we're the staff. First time I have been there, definitely wont be the last.
